title: Where Do You Put Your Faith
itunes:title: Where Do You Put Your Faith
description: The readings for this weekend pose a blunt question: whom, finally, do you trust? "Trust" is meant here in an absolute sense. Where do you base your life? In God or in the things of this world? How you answer that question determines pretty much everything else.
